name: Unitil Corporation
description: Unitil Corporation is a public utility holding company that provides electric and natural gas utility services to customers in New England. Founded in 1984 and headquartered in Hampton, New Hampshire, Unitil serves over 100,000 customers across New Hampshire, Massachusetts, and Maine. The company operates through its subsidiaries, which include Unitil Energy Systems, Fitchburg Gas and Electric Light Company, and Northern Utilities. Unitil is committed to delivering safe, reliable, and efficient energy solutions and is actively involved in the transition to cleaner energy sources. The company invests in renewable energy initiatives and energy efficiency programs to meet the evolving needs of its customers while complying with environmental regulations. Unitil's mission is to enhance the quality of life in the communities it serves by providing energy solutions that are sustainable and beneficial. The company strives to maintain its strong financial performance while supporting the local economy and fostering community development.

key_executives.name: Sharon L. K. D. D. R. M. R. A. D. J. Haynes

faq.answer: Thomas P. Meissner Jr. is the CEO of Unitil Corporation.

faq.answer: Unitil is committed to investing in renewable energy initiatives and energy efficiency programs.
